Table Mountain: Mike: Cable car was overcrowded and there was no where comfortable to sit at the top.
Trevi Fountain: Duncan Peabody: Gorgeous architecture. A piece of history.
Peter Smith: Beautiful, but crowded. Lots of cooler less popular places.
Giza Pyramids: Jenny: Felt like stepping back in time. Disquieting, but really interesting.
Caroline Ley: Go to the light show on the pyramids, it's spectacular.
